text: Daniel Michael Hernandez is a Mexican American journalist, essayist and author. He was born in 1980 in San Diego, California, USA. Hernandez is currently Food Editor of the Los Angeles Times. In 2024, he was nominated for a James Beard Foundation Media Award for his series of articles about Mexico City. ==References== Category:Journalists from California Category:1980 births Category:Living people
title: Daniel Hernandez (journalist)
